preference.name: SUBSCMPL_msd_request_xsl_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path to the XSL file used to convert TC-XML file into material substance declaration Request XML file. Valid values are: * tcxml_to_msd_request_1752a.xsl: Use mentioned XSL in case SUBSCMPL_request_msd_format preference specifies "IPC_1752A" value. This is the default. * tcxml_to_msd_request_1752_2v1_1.xsl: Use mentioned XSL in case SUBSCMPL_request_msd_format preference specifies "IPC_1752-2" value.
